name: Bros's Adventure: Shooter
description:
***** BATTLE MODE *******
+ Arena mode with real player in global.
+ 10 Soldiers with Special Weapon
+ 5 Drone and more
+ Infinity Battle
+ Campaign Battle
+ 80 levels update every week.
+ Arena Mode with 1vs1 and 1vs2

You love Classic Platform. You would like to return childhood memory, Our game Super Bros Adventures is best choice for you.

* 3 Mode Adventure: Classic Adventure mode, Run mode and Puzzle mode.

Features:
* Chat Global.
* Global Leaderboards.
* Just tap the button to let the boy jump.
* Help boy to pass all the challenges to where you need to cross different obstacles.
* Run to the end of the candy castle to pass the level.
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.
* Suitable for all age.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week.

Super Bros Adventure is a FREE game with addictive and exhilarating adventure game.
